<h2>Introduction</h2>
The purpose of this page is to document the interface for libdoorbell and the intended uses of those interfaces.  The libdoorbell syntax is closely modelled after vixie-cron syntax.

<h2>API</h2>

<pre>
  <nowiki>
typedef enum
{
  DBELL_ACTION_CODE_DONE,
  DBELL_ACTION_CODE_REMOVE
}ACTION_CODE
typedef ACTION_CODE (*dbell_actionFunc)(const char *schedName, void *actionData)

typedef enum
{
  DBELL_SUCCESS,
}DBELL_CODE

DBELL_CODE dbell_scheduleAction(const char *schedule, const char *schedName, action_func action, void *actionData)

typedef void (*dbell_errorCB)(DBELL_CODE err, const char *errString)
  </nowiki>
</pre>

<h2>Scheduling Syntax</h2>
Modelled after Vixie Cron and Vixie Cron man page for freebsd.

<h4>Special Strings</h4>
<pre>
@reboot         Run once, at startup.
@yearly         Run once a year, "0 0 1 1 *".
@annually       (same as @yearly)
@monthly        Run once a month, "0 0 1 * *".
@weekly         Run once a week, "0 0 * * 0".
@daily          Run once a day, "0 0 * * *".
@midnight       (same as @daily)
@hourly         Run once an hour, "0 * * * *".
</pre>
